price: 3. He has created the heavens and the earth with truth. High is He, Exalted above all that they associate as partners with Him.
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ تَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi taʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
